experience_assessment: I have published one or two papers in this area.
title: Official Blind Review #2
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I read the paper at least twice and used my best judgement in assessing the paper.
review:
Summary: 
[...]


Conclusion:
I have read the paper multiple times and I still have a problem summarizing the paper with my own words. The contributions summarize the most fundamental works of RL but do not really relate these methods to the proposed approach. Therefore, I am still uncertain about the general motivation and intention of the work as well as the evaluation. Currently I vote for borderline reject as I am familiar with RL & PDE'S but do not understand the motivation and intention. I am leaning towards rejection as the paper is a resubmission from Neurips and has not been substantially improved. However, I am not certain about my evaluation. I am happy to adapt my vote based on the other reviewers and a clarified and better structured paper, which can be submitted during the rebuttal.
